title: Religare Wellness is now Fortis Health World and is taking E-commerce by Storm
text:
Thursday, September 10, 2015 2:01PM IST (8:31AM GMT) Religare Wellness is now Fortis Health World and is taking E-commerce by Storm New Delhi, Delhi, India 
RWL Healthworld Ltd. (formerly known as Religare Wellness) has been re-branded as Fortis Health World; and is successfully running a leading e-commerce portal that sells beauty, wellness and health-care products such as baby care products, face and skin care range, home and living utilities as well as diabetic remedies. The company has a strong online and offline presence under the newly acquired brand, Fortis Health World where they have garnered a lot of attention with stores across cities such as Bengaluru, Delhi, and Gurgaon, etc., and also through their portal www.fortishealthworld.com .“Following the ongoing trend of the expansion of the digital platform, we are working closely with digital marketing agencies to effectively increase the scale of our operations online. Leading in the offline wellness arena as well, Fortis Health World has also been operating 100 retail stores across India trying to bring forth the best international home and beauty range to our customers”, said Rahul Chadha, CEO, Fortis Health World.“Through the online portal, we have seen a growth in our popularity in comparison to rival portals such as HealthKart etc. We are looking forward to work on our brand by promoting its online presence much more through newspaper and radio ads. This is being worked upon more intensely as we have seen significant traction in the online space”- added Rahul Chadha, CEO, Fortis Health World. The company has been working with top-notch technology firms to successfully conquer the online platform through which, they would like to provide their patrons the ease of purchasing home and wellness products within the comfort of the latter’s homes. Subsequently, they have decided to invest more resources into building an even more visible presence as an online establishment. About Us Fortishealthworld.com is the ecommerce portal of RWL Healthworld Ltd. (formerly known as Religare Wellness Ltd), one of India’s leading health care retailers which operates a chain of over 100 retail stores across India. Fortishealthworld.com has been founded with a vision of extending discerning store services and an exciting assortment of wellbeing products, to its customers, at the click of a button. Our experience in sourcing the highest quality products from some of the best brands in the world, gives us the ability to sell with confidence while ensuring that customer satisfaction is guaranteed. Our assortment includes a wide range of health and wellness products especially in the areas of Baby Care , Nutritional Supplements/Foods, Home Care Devices, Diabetes Management, Beauty and Personal Care Products .
